overview: In this anti-drug film narrated by Grace Kelly, a group of narcotics agents working for the United Nations inject a radioactive compound into a seized shipment of opium at the Afghanistanâ€“Iran border, in the hopes that it will lead them to the main heroin distributor in Europe.
tagline: The story of another war more deadly...more destructive...against the world wide opium conspiracy.
title: Poppies Are Also Flowers
